task.title: Configuring security profiles by using the
task.shortdesc: System administrators can configure security profiles by using the Security Settings page in the .

prereq.p: If you need to enable Transport Layer Security (TLS) on an endpoint, you must create a certificate profile before you can create a security profile. The certificate profile defines the server certificate to use in the security profile. For more information about creating a certificate profile, see .

context.p: You can configure security profiles by using the , or by using . For more information about using to configure security profiles, see .
For more information about the components that you must specify when you configure security profiles, see .

step.cmd: Go to the Security Settings page in one of the following ways:

choices.choice: From the Home tab, click Server Security in the Secure your environment pane.
From the Server menu, click Security Settings.

step.cmd: Choose an action from the Security Profiles pane:

choices.choice: To add a security profile, click the Add icon.
To delete a security profile, select the profile and click the Delete icon.
To edit a security profile, select the profile and click the Edit icon.
